name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Site Condition
Acceptance Criteria - All loose material removed including topsoil, silt, tree debris, rocks etc.
2.2 - Site clearing - form bench and/or roughen rock subgrade
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Site Condition
Acceptance Criteria - Safe working platform for machinery. Roughening of papa rock subgrade - no smooth surface visiable.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Material Quality
Acceptance Criteria - Engineer approval of lab results
Frequency - Once - or again if source changes
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Material Quality
Acceptance Criteria - Engineer approval of lab results
Frequency - Once - or again if source changes
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Material Quality
Acceptance Criteria - Engineer approval of lab results
Frequency - Once - or again if source changes
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Site Condition
Acceptance Criteria - All loose material removed, roughen or bench papa subgrade, graded base to ensure water can drain away.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Quantity Control
Frequency - Once - when site is at subgrade
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Quality Control
Acceptance Criteria - Plateau Testing - observation of plateau in wet density
Verifying Document - WSP Plateau Test Results
Frequency - When material or compaction device changed
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Quality Control
• Fill below culvert invert: Average MDD of 98%, min 95%
• Fill around & above culvert: Average MDD of 95%, min 92%
• Locations (incl. lit number and height) recorded.
• If fails, further 3 tests within 5m. If any of those fail, dig out, replace & recompact.
Verifying Document - WSP NDM Results (every 2-3 layers) and DNZ Onsite NDM Records (every layer)
Inspection: Key - Monitor, Review & Hold Point (if not met)
Inspection: Date - Ongoing, Included in Weekly Reports #3 & #4 so far
2.10 - Seperation of existing fill that cannot be safely removed
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Quality Control
Acceptance Criteria - Geotextile (Strength Class C) placed between existing fill that cannot be safely removed and new fill (mitigate fines migration).
